HomePage.location: Ina zaune a Jihar Borno, Najeriya. NG
HomePage.resume: Mai haɓaka cikakken tsari tare da tushe mai ƙarfi a cikin TypeScript, React, da fasahar blockchain. Ina ƙirƙirar aikace-aikacen yanar gizo da na wayar hannu masu aminci, masu girma, da inganci, yana tabbatar da kwarewar mai amfani mai sauƙi. Ina sha'awar warware matsaloli da samar da mafita na dijital masu kirkira.

services.title: Ayyuka
services.sub_title: Ni mai haɓaka cikakken tsari ne wanda ya ƙware wajen gina aikace-aikacen yanar gizo da na wayar hannu masu aiki ga ƙungiyoyi, kamfanoni, cibiyoyi, da farawa. Ina mai da hankali wajen samar da mafita na dijital da aka tsara, masu ƙarfi, da kuma masu tsaro.

cta.title: Mu Gina Wani Abu Mai Girma!
cta.sub_title: Ina samuwa don ayyukan zaman kansa. Ko kuna buƙatar mafita na yanar gizo ko wayar hannu, mu haɗa kai mu kawo ra'ayinku zuwa rai. Tuntuɓe ni, kuma mu ƙirƙiri wani abu mai ban mamaki tare!

resume.paragraf_1: Sannu! Na gode da ziyartar shafin yanar gizon na na kashin kai. Ni mai haɓaka cikakken tsari ne tare da sha'awa ga gina aikace-aikacen yanar gizo da na wayar hannu masu aminci, masu ƙarfi, da inganci. Tare da ƙwarewa a cikin TypeScript, React, Next.js, da haɓaka blockchain, ina jin daɗin warware matsaloli masu wahala da samar da kwarewar mai amfani mai sauƙi.
resume.paragraf_2: Na ƙware wajen ƙirƙirar mafita na dijital da ke aiki da kyau kuma mai sauƙin amfani. Tsarin fasahar da nake amfani da shi yana haɗa da JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, da Express.js, tare da ƙwarewa a cikin tsarin ainihi, biyan kuɗi na NFC, da haɗin blockchain. A matsayin wanda ke da sauƙin canzawa da kuma mai koyo cikin sauri, ina ɗaukar sabbin ƙalubale da ci gaba da haɓaka ƙwarewata domin in ci gaba da kasancewa a gaban sabbin fasahohin.
resume.paragraf_3: Haɗin kai da sadarwa suna da muhimmanci ga aikina. Ina jin daɗin aiki tare da ƙungiyoyi, ina ba da ƙwarewata, da kuma koyon daga wasu. Tunanin warware matsaloli na da kuma iya jagoranci suna ba ni damar kewayawa cikin sauƙi cikin ayyukan da suka shafi ƙalubale. Idan kuna neman mai haɓaka wanda zai kawo ra'ayinku zuwa rai, mu haɗa kai mu ƙirƙiri wani abu mai ban mamaki tare!

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Na haɓaka kuma na kula da tsarin back-end don dandalin haya da siyan ƙasa ta amfani da Node.js da Express.js, yana tabbatar da tsaro da ingancin gudanar da ma'amaloli.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Na yi aiki da bayanai kamar MongoDB da SQL don gudanar da jerin ƙasa, bayanan masu amfani, da rikodin ma'amala.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Na haɗa APIs na ɓangare na uku don aiwatar da biyan kuɗi da ayyukan gano wurare, yana ba da damar masu amfani su kammala saye da haya na ƙasa cikin sauƙi.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Na aiwatar da iko na samun dama bisa ga rawar da masu amfani ke takawa (admin, mai siye, mai sayarwa) don tabbatar da samun damar da ta dace ga albarkatu.
responsibilities.responsibility_5: Na inganta tambayoyin bayanai da hanyoyin API don haɓaka da aikin, yana tabbatar da cewa back-end zai iya ɗaukar ƙarin zirga-zirga da tambayoyin da suka haɗa da rikitarwa.
responsibilities.responsibility_6: Na haɗa kai da ƙungiyar front-end don haɗa sabuntawa na ainihi da ayyukan masu amfani don samun ƙwarewar mai amfani mai sauƙi.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Na haɓaka kuma na kula da lambar frontend da backend ta amfani da Next.js, Privy.io, da Vercel don haɗawa da amfani da sauƙi.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Na aiwatar da tabbatar da tsaron shiga na masu amfani da haɗin hanyoyin biyan kuɗi ta amfani da Privy.io da sauran kayan aikin.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Na haɗa kai da ƙungiyar aiki daga nesa don gina da ƙaddamar da fasaloli ga abokan ciniki, bisa ga tsarin haɓaka Agile.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Na tabbatar da cewa an cika wa'adin ayyukan yayin da aka kiyaye ingancin lambar da aikin.

ContactPage.title: Tuntuɓi Mu
ContactPage.description: Ina son haɗa kai da kai! Ko kana da tambaya, ra'ayin haɗin gwiwa, ko kawai kana so ka ce sannu, ji daɗin tuntuɓar mu.

social_media.title: Mu haɗa kai a kan Kafofin Sadarwar Zamani

gmail.title: Mu Ci Gaba da Tuntuɓa
gmail.description: Kana da wani aikin a zuciya ko kawai kana so ka tattauna? Aika min da imel, zan dawo maka da sauri!

instagram.title: Biyo Tafiyata
instagram.description: Samu kyakkyawar fahimta game da aikina, rayuwata, da abubuwan da ke faruwa a bayan fage. Biyo ni a Instagram don sabuntawa, fahimta, da ƙarfafa gwiwa.

linkedin.title: Mu Tashi Tare
linkedin.description: Kana neman haɗin kai na ƙwararru, fahimta game da masana'antu, ko damar haɗin gwiwa? Mu haɗa kai a LinkedIn mu gina wani abu mai kyau tare.

tiktok.title: Kasance Cikin Nishaɗi
tiktok.description: Shiga tare da ni a TikTok don haɗin kai na kirkira, nishaɗi, da abun ciki mai ban sha'awa. Kada ka bari nishaɗin ya wuce!

github.title: Bincika Ayyukana
github.description: Shiga cikin ayyukan lambar na, gudunmawar buɗe tushen, da gwaje-gwajen fasaha akan GitHub. Mu haɗa kai mu gina wani abu mai ban mamaki!

twitter.title: Biyo Ni a Twitter
twitter.description: Shiga tattaunawar a Twitter don samun sabbin labarai, haske, da ƙarin abubuwa daga al'umma na masu haɓaka.

youtube.title: Koyo da Bincike
youtube.description: Biya wa tashar YouTube ta don koyawa, nuna ayyuka, da fahimtar tafiyata a cikin ci gaban lamba. Mu tashi tare!
